Package cz.cuni.mff.dataset_products

Class DatasetDeserializer

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.dataset_products.DatasetDeserializer
public class DatasetDeserializer extends Object
Class for deserializing JSON files with products from the Zoot and Zalando datasets.

  • Method Details

    • deserializeJsonCollection

      public static <T> List<T> deserializeJsonCollection(File jsonFile, Class<T> objectType) throws IOException
      Deserializes a JSON file with products from the Zoot or Zalando dataset. The method uses the provided objectType to deserialize the JSON file into a list of objects of the given type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object to deserialize
      Parameters:
      jsonFile - the JSON file with products
      objectType - the type of the object to deserialize
      Returns:
      the list of deserialized objects (products)
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file could not be read or the object could not be deserialized

    • getZootDatasetFiles

      public static List<File> getZootDatasetFiles()
      Retrieves the list of files with products from the Zoot dataset.
      Returns:
      the list of files with collections of products from the Zoot dataset

    • getZalandoDatasetFiles

      public static List<File> getZalandoDatasetFiles()
      Retrieves the list of files with products from the Zalando dataset.
      Returns:
      the list of files with collections of products from the Zalando dataset
